scripts.sw: yarn sw:stop; yarn typegen; yarn openapi:build; yarn openapi; yarn sw:up
scripts.openapi:build: rm -rf ../openapi; openapi-generator generate -c config.json -i swagger.yaml -g kotlin-server -o ../openapi; ./sed.sh
scripts.typegen: rm -rf ../app/infrastructure/network/<%= appName %>/schema; npm run swagpack && openapi-ts-gen generate swagger.yaml --namespace <%= appName %> --dist ../app/infrastructure/network/<%= appName %>/schema
